summary: The diff updates HERO_PORTRAIT_PATH to point to a cropped headshot derivative, but there is insufficient evidence that the actual portrait asset was added/updated and REQ-26â€™s constraint that only heroPortrait.ts be updated is violated by additional modified files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Hero portrait to use only the newly uploaded image file "20230909_152253-4.jpg" (or a cropped derivative) with no other portrait/stock/placeholder image referenced.
missing_requirements.reason: The config path is updated to a cropped derivative filename, but the diff summary shows no added/updated image asset file, so it cannot be confirmed that the displayed hero portrait actually comes from the uploaded image rather than a missing/broken or pre-existing asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: Adjust the hero portrait crop so the full head/face is visible and shoulders/upper torso are retained, with no filters/effects/borders/frames.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only changes a string path; it does not include the image itself or any verifiable change to the crop/framing. The filename suggests a crop, but the crop compliance cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep HeroSection rendering intact and update only the portrait asset reference so the Hero uses the new uploaded photo/cropped derivative (heroPortrait.ts should be the only code/config location updated).
missing_requirements.reason: In addition to heroPortrait.ts, the diff summary shows other files modified, so the acceptance criterion that heroPortrait.ts is the only updated code/config location is not satisfied as written.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/summary files unrelated to the requested hero portrait asset reference change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest restricts changes to updating only the hero portrait asset reference (and explicitly calls out heroPortrait.ts as the only code/config update). Modifying these additional files was not requested.
